    <item>
      <title>Watson gives &#163;1m to harassment fund ahead of BAFTAs</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/baftas-stars-calls-for-end-of-sexual-harassment-ahead-of-award-ceremony-11255982</link>
      <description>Emma Watson has donated &#163;1m to a new fund aiming to tackle a "culture of harassment, abuse and impunity". </description>
      <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 08:06:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/baftas-stars-calls-for-end-of-sexual-harassment-ahead-of-award-ceremony-11255982</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/10/70x70/skynews-emma-watson-actress_4140732.jpg?20180218144123" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Emma Watson</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/10/70x70/skynews-emma-watson-actress_4140732.jpg?20180218144123" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/10/70x70/skynews-emma-watson-actress_4140732.jpg?20180218144123"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Studio boss who 'protected Weinstein' is sacked</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/weinstein-studio-chief-fired-after-he-protected-disgraced-film-producer-11255768</link>
      <description>The president of Harvey Weinstein's film studio has been fired less than a week after he was accused of protecting the disgraced producer.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 22:30:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/weinstein-studio-chief-fired-after-he-protected-disgraced-film-producer-11255768</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109618807_4234001.jpg?20180217223343" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">David Glasser has been fired from the Weinstein Company</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109618807_4234001.jpg?20180217223343" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/2371802170109618807_4234001.jpg?20180217223343"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>BAFTAs 2018: Who will win and who should?</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/baftas-2018-who-will-win-and-who-should-11251489</link>
      <description></description>
      <pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 13:20:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/baftas-2018-who-will-win-and-who-should-11251489</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/01/70x70/088e26c5e8fac933062d32f61763dacf199af32e7ab8bab7ddea72a09c6af531_3867296.jpg?20170110073034" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">The winners will be revealed at the ceremony on 12 February</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/01/70x70/088e26c5e8fac933062d32f61763dacf199af32e7ab8bab7ddea72a09c6af531_3867296.jpg?20170110073034" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/01/70x70/088e26c5e8fac933062d32f61763dacf199af32e7ab8bab7ddea72a09c6af531_3867296.jpg?20170110073034"/>

    <item>
      <title>British film industry at a defining point</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/british-film-industry-at-a-defining-point-in-its-history-11255025</link>
      <description>As the British film industry prepares for its biggest celebration of the year, it finds itself at a defining point in its history according to some of the leading voices in UK movie-making.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 16:29:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/british-film-industry-at-a-defining-point-in-its-history-11255025</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-bafta-british-awards_4233679.jpg?20180217163639" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Polished BAFTA (British Academy of Film and Television Arts) masks sit in a box during a photocall at the New Pro Foundries, west of London on January 31, 2017. The masks will be presented to winners at BAFTA&#39;s awards ceremony in London on February 12, 2017. / AFP / Daniel LEAL-OLIVAS (Photo credit should read DANIEL LEAL-OLIVAS/AFP/Getty Images)
</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-bafta-british-awards_4233679.jpg?20180217163639" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-bafta-british-awards_4233679.jpg?20180217163639"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Rita Ora jets to Kosovo for independence party</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/singer-rita-ora-jets-to-kosovo-for-independence-party-11255498</link>
      <description>Pop star Rita Ora has flown to Kosovo to headline a concert marking a decade since her country of birth became independent from Serbia.</description>
      <pubDate>Sat, 17 Feb 2018 19:19:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/singer-rita-ora-jets-to-kosovo-for-independence-party-11255498</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-rita-ora-kosovo_4233877.jpg?20180217192338" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Ora told a press conference Kosovo was on an &#39;incredible journey&#39;</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-rita-ora-kosovo_4233877.jpg?20180217192338" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-rita-ora-kosovo_4233877.jpg?20180217192338"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux split</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/jennifer-aniston-and-justin-theroux-split-but-remain-best-friends-11252492</link>
      <description>Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux have split up less than three years after getting married.</description>

      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/jennifer-aniston-and-justin-theroux-split-but-remain-best-friends-11252492</guid>

      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-jennifer-aniston-justin-theroux_4232409.jpg?20180216051133" width="70" height="70"/>

    </item>

      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/saoirse-ronan-bafta-blackout-gives-sense-of-purpose-11250426</link>

    <item>
      <title>Third of music venues under financial threat</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/third-of-music-venues-under-financial-threat-national-survey-shows-11252491</link>
      <description>Research from the UK's first live music census has found that small venues are under threat from business rates and property development.</description>
      <pubDate>Fri, 16 Feb 2018 04:48:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/third-of-music-venues-under-financial-threat-national-survey-shows-11252491</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-band-music-live-music_4232564.jpg?20180216090126" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Taka Hirose of Feeder performs live on stage at Hard Rock Cafe</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-band-music-live-music_4232564.jpg?20180216090126" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/18/02/70x70/skynews-band-music-live-music_4232564.jpg?20180216090126"/>
    </item>
    <item>
      <title>Fashion comes out of the closet over abuse</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/fashion-comes-out-of-the-closet-over-abuse-after-weinstein-scandal-11252421</link>
      <description>London Fashion Week arrives at a challenging time for the industry.</description>

    <item>
      <title>Kanye West settles legal fight over cancelled tour</title>
      <link>http://news.sky.com/story/kanye-west-settles-insurance-pay-out-dispute-over-cancelled-tour-11251582</link>
      <description>Kanye West has reached an out-of-court settlement with Lloyd's of London in a wrangle over an insurance pay-out for a cancelled tour, centring on claims about cannabis use.</description>
      <pubDate>Thu, 15 Feb 2018 14:20:00 +0000</pubDate>
      <guid>http://news.sky.com/story/kanye-west-settles-insurance-pay-out-dispute-over-cancelled-tour-11251582</guid>
      <enclosure url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/05/70x70/ffc093652968bc2dfea84aaea78f082e80659539fe3d487010104cdc19cf215a_3946434.jpg?20180215151931" length="0" type="image/jpeg"/>
      <media:description type="html">Kanye West</media:description>
      <media:thumbnail url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/05/70x70/ffc093652968bc2dfea84aaea78f082e80659539fe3d487010104cdc19cf215a_3946434.jpg?20180215151931" width="70" height="70"/>
      <media:content type="image/jpeg" url="http://e3.365dm.com/17/05/70x70/ffc093652968bc2dfea84aaea78f082e80659539fe3d487010104cdc19cf215a_3946434.jpg?20180215151931"/>
